other_tests.findings: Scarring in bilateral lung bases, no focal opacity or nodules, no pleural or pericardial effusion. The liver enhances homogeneously without focal lesions, pancreatic duct dilation not noted. A large cyst in the lower pole of the left kidney measures 6.2 x 5.3 cm. The appendix is partially visualized, dilated, with extensive surrounding fat stranding.
